ref: 8479 pragrāhayati ʻ receives ʼ MBh. [Cf. prágr̥hṇāti ʻ holds ʼ AV., Pa. paggaṇhāti ʻ takes up ʼ, caus. paggahēti, pp. paggahita -- , Pk. paggahiya -- (paggaï ʻ seizes ʼ see *pakkaḍ -- ). -- √grah]

lang: Woṭapūrī (language of Woṭapūr and Kaṭārqalā — Dard.)
ref: Woṭ. bakā -- ʻ to take ʼ (pret. gat < *ghr̥pta -- ) dissim. fr. *pagā -- Buddruss Woṭ 92.
